testcase.name: Register new user name
testcase.system-out: Given I am able to navigate onto the login page.............................passed When I click on the sign up button..........................................passed When I enter the firstname as "kogile27"....................................passed And I enter the lastname as "nethra27"......................................passed And I enter the e-mail as "domin27@gmail.com"...............................passed And I enter the username as "nethra12327"...................................passed And I enter the password as "admin12327"....................................passed And I enter the confirmpassword as "admin12327".............................passed And I click on the registration button......................................passed And I click on the picture button...........................................passed And I click on the inbox button.............................................passed And I click on the compose button...........................................passed And I click on sendto as "nethrakg@gmail"...................................passed And I enter the subject as "Hi For Testing".................................passed And I click on the Send Message button......................................passed Then I should see the acknowledgement window as "The message has been sent to kogile nethra (nethra123)".passed
